src:
Gegara Cas HP, Rumah di Kramat Jati Terbakar
04 Nov 2019, 01:17 by Ibnu Hariyanto
Jakarta - Kebakaran rumah terjadi di Batu Ampar, Kramat Jati, Jakarta Timur. Kebakaran itu diduga akibat dari korsleting listrik saat mengecas handphone.
"Iya benar, penyebabnya dari HP yang dicas," kata Kasi Pengendali dan Pengawasan Sudin Penanggulangan Kebakaran dan Penyelamatan (PKP) Jaktim Gatot Sulaiman saat dikonfirmasi, Senin (4/11/2019).
Kebakaran terjadi sekitar pukul 00.00 WIB. Ia mengatakan ada tiga mobil pemadam kebakaran yang dikerahkan ke lokasi.
"Tadi ada tiga (mobil pemadam kebakaran)," sebutnya.
Kini api tersebut sudah dapat dipadamkan. Gatot mengaku tidak ada korban jiwa dalam kejadian itu.
"Nihil (korban jiwa)," tuturnya.

(ibh/mae)
text:
Gegara Cas HP, House in Kramat Jati Burned
Nov 04 2019, 01:17 by Ibnu Hariyanto
Jakarta - House fire occurred in Batu Ampar, Kramat Jati, East Jakarta. The fire was allegedly the result of an electrical short circuit when charging cellphones.
"Yes, it is true, the cause is from the cellphone that was charged," said Section Head of Control and Oversight of the East Jakarta Fire and Rescue Prevention Agency (PKP) Gatot Sulaiman when confirmed, Monday (11/04/2019).
The fire occurred around 00.00 WIB. He said there were three fire trucks deployed to the location.
"There were three (fire trucks)," he said.
Now the fire can be extinguished. Gatot claimed there were no fatalities in the incident.
"Zero (fatalities)," he said.

(ibh / mae)
